english_example_sentence: If I had played that challenging game, I would have won easily.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я играл в ту сложную игру, я бы легко выиграл.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben o zorlu oyunu oynamışsam, kesinlikle kolayca kazanacaktım.
